mapper.select: select id, market_code, market_name, pre_close_point, open_point, cur_point, min_point, max_point, trade_amount, trade_volume, cur_time from stock_market_index_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into stock_market_index_info(market_code, market_name, pre_close_point, open_point, cur_point, min_point, max_point, trade_amount, trade_volume, cur_time) values (#{marketCode}, #{marketName}, #{preClosePoint}, #{openPoint}, #{curPoint}, #{minPoint}, #{maxPoint}, #{tradeAmount}, #{tradeVolume}, #{curTime})

insert into stock_market_index_info(market_code, market_name, pre_close_point, open_point, cur_point, min_point, max_point, trade_amount, trade_volume, cur_time) values
(#{entity.marketCode}, #{entity.marketName}, #{entity.preClosePoint}, #{entity.openPoint}, #{entity.curPoint}, #{entity.minPoint}, #{entity.maxPoint}, #{entity.tradeAmount}, #{entity.tradeVolume}, #{entity.curTime})

insert into stock_market_index_info(market_code, market_name, pre_close_point, open_point, cur_point, min_point, max_point, trade_amount, trade_volume, cur_time) values
(#{entity.marketCode}, #{entity.marketName}, #{entity.preClosePoint}, #{entity.openPoint}, #{entity.curPoint}, #{entity.minPoint}, #{entity.maxPoint}, #{entity.tradeAmount}, #{entity.tradeVolume}, #{entity.curTime})
on duplicate key update market_code = values(market_code), market_name = values(market_name), pre_close_point = values(pre_close_point), open_point = values(open_point), cur_point = values(cur_point), min_point = values(min_point), max_point = values(max_point), trade_amount = values(trade_amount), trade_volume = values(trade_volume), cur_time = values(cur_time)
mapper.update:
update stock_market_index_info
market_code = #{marketCode},
market_name = #{marketName},
pre_close_point = #{preClosePoint},
open_point = #{openPoint},
cur_point = #{curPoint},
min_point = #{minPoint},
max_point = #{maxPoint},
trade_amount = #{tradeAmount},
trade_volume = #{tradeVolume},
cur_time = #{curTime},
where id = #{id}
